summary: A small house on the tip of staff.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]A small house on the tip of staff. Staff of Shalidor will be added to your inventory when you load the game. Equip staff and select an action. 

[url=https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects][size=2][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1535556014__11111.png[/img][/size][size=5]﻿[b]Support Haem Projects on Patreon![/b][/size][/url]﻿


[center][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1526230176__1.png[/img]﻿﻿[/center][/size]

[size=3][b]Features: [/b][/size]
[size=2]The world turned upside down; 
Crazy unusual design; 
Common containers; 
Always with you; 
Ease of use; [/size]

[size=3][b]Requirements: [/b][/size]
[size=2]All DLСs [/size]

[size=3][b]Uninstall: [/b][/size]
[size=2]Before uninstalling mod empty all containers, drop staff from your inventory and exit interior cell. [/size]

[center][youtube]pO0yFUerIDY[/youtube][youtube]Awy_AW5AtSk[/youtube][/center]

[size=3][b]Created by: [/b][/size]
[size=2][url=https://haemprojects.com]Haem Projects[/url] (Dimonoider & gkalian) [/size]
